inn1.comm: on the off stump, driven back to the bowler
outside off, stuck on the pads of an inside edge
on the leg stump, turns to mid wicket
outside the off stump, driven to extra cover for a couple
on the middle stump, defended on the back foot
on the off stump, defended to point of the front foot
plays defensively  to point on the front foot
on the off stump, left alone to the keeper
on the off stump, offers a dead bat as a line of defense
short outside the off stump, pushed to point
short outside off, steered to backward point for a single
outside the off stump, short in length. Left alone to the keeper
on the leg stump, hit on the pads as he tries to flick it
outside the off stump and left alone
good length on the stumps, defended on the back foot
short outside off, steered to gully
short of length outside off, cut to keeper. bottom edge to the keeper
short outside off, swinging away tries to cut and gets a bottom edge onto the stumps
on the off stump and moving away, left alone
short on the leg stump, pulled to mid wicket
short on the middle stump, defended back to the bowler
on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
on the off stump, drives to cover on the front foot
outside off and swinging away, left alone to the keeper
on the legs, tries to flick and is rapped on the pads
outside off and swinging away, left alone to the keeper
short outside off, left alone to the keeper
short of length on the off stump, defended on the front foot
on the off stump and moving away, left alone to the keeper
outside off swinging away, left alone to the keeper
on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
outside off, swings away from a good length
on the legs, flicks straight to Sinclair positioned at mid wicket
short outside off stump, and swinging away, tries to pull and pulls away at the last moment
outside off and swinging away, left alone
outside off, coming in, struck high on the pads
outside off and swinging away, goes for the drive at full tilt and misses
on the off stump, coming in and going down leg, called a wide
outside off and swinging away, goes for the drive nad all that he manages to get an outside edge to third man for a single
on the off stump, drives it in the vee on the off side for a couple
on the off, and rising, drives on the rise to mid off
on the leg stump, flicks to square leg
on the leg stump, trurns to square leg
on the off stump and swinging away, left alone to the keeper
on the middle stump, defends on the front foot back to the bowler
outside off, coming in, defended on the backfoot to cover
on the leg stump, flicks to square leg
outside off and swinging away, tries to drive on the backfoot and misses
on the leg stump, flicks to deep square leg for a single
outside off and swinging away, cut to cover
outside off and coming in, defended on the back foot
outside off, coming in . Tamim gets behind the line of the ball and drives to mid off. Still no run taken
on the leg stump, and rising. defends on the back foot
outside off and swinging away, pokes at it to get a single to third man
outside off and coming in, defended on the front foot
on the leg stump and on his hips, flicks straight to square leg
outside off and coming in, swinging prodigiously, left alone
on the leg stump, pushes to mid wicket for a single
outside off and keeping the line, defends on the back foot, back to the bowler
outside off and fuller in length,drives on the up to mid off
outside off and coming in, driven on the back foot to extra cover for a single
outside off, cut to third man for a single
on the leg stump, turned to square leg for a single
on the leg stump, good length. gets an inside edge back into his box
outside off and swinging away, driven to mid off
on the leg stump, off the pads to square leg for a leg bye
on the middle stump and swinging away. Tamim drives on the up straight to cover
outside off and swinging away. Tamim gets forward and gets a thick outside edge  to point
outside off and swinging away. guided of the back foot to point
outside off and swinging away, steered of the back foot to third man for a single
outside off and coming in, decides at the last moment to let it go to the keeper
short outside off and pulled over mid wicket for a couple
outside off and swinging away, drives on the up to mid off
short outside off, and swinging away, guided to point
on the middle stump, fuller in length. Drives on the full to mid on
on the leg stump, flicks to deep square leg for a single
on the off stump and on the bouncer length. ducks below the ball
on the leg stump, flicks to square leg
outside off and swinging away a touch. Ashraful moves across, covers the line of the delivery and lets it go
short outside off, rank bad ball. Ashraful cuts to point for a lip smacking boundary
outside off, and swinging away a touch, steered to third man for a single
short on the leg stump. Tamim defends on the back foot to square leg for a single
short outside off, Ashraful plays a delicate steer to third man for a single
outside the leg stump, tries to flick to square leg and is struck outside the line of stumps
outside off and swinging away a touch. Ashraful works out a way to keep getting singles by steering to third man for a single
a mirror image of the way Ashraful is playing, outside off steered to third man for a single
on the leg stump, this time around, flicks to mid wicket for a single
on the legs , Tamim turns it off hs hips for a single
bounces over his head and rightfully called a wide
on the middle stump, steps down the track and moves away. lifts it higfh over point's head for a boundary now
outside off and swinging away. left alone to the keeper
outside off and swinging away. Tamim tries to steer and misses
short of length on leg stump, he hops up and plays to square leg
gone! A touch wide and he thinks about running it fine but can only find Styris at first slip, a regulation outside edge gets Mason a wicket
back of a good length on the stumps and he gets in line to play it back
good length on off stump, Aftab shuffles across and defends it back
and thats a wicket maiden for Mason, as Aftab defends one towards cover
good start, nice and tidy ball on off stump gets him defending forward
short of a length outside off, good carry and Ashraful leaves it be
good length a touch wider, Ashraful gets across and shoulders arms

short of a length outside off, Ashraful quickly gets across and plays with soft hands, there's extra lift on that ball but he gets back nicely and drops it at his feet, calling for the run and Aftab responds well
beaten, as he pushes forward to another that sits up nicely, he tries to then hold the bat back out of the ball's line but narrowly misses getting an edge
gets up and defends one, getting a thick edge safely along the ground past gully for a single, and that will be drinks
short on the middle stum and coming in, Aftab moves back as he spots it early but unable to get enough wood onto the ball
outside off and moving away ever so slightly. Aftab goes back and pokes uncertainly at it. Predictably he is beaten all ends up
fuller on the middle stump, flicks to square leg for a single

short outside off, Ashraful being an instinctive puller goes for it and does not get enough on the ball as it fails to clear Oram at fine leg, who judges well to take the catch. Ashraful's strength proves to be his downfall this time round. It helps to have taller fielders on the ground
fuller on the middle stump, Tushar tries to flick it to mid wicket and  gets a leading edge to cover and sets off. Is struggling to make his ground as the throw from cover is off mark
short outside off and coming in, defends on the back foot to point
short outside off and coming in. Tushar gets behind the line and lets it go to the keeper
drifting onto the legs this time. Umpire has no hesitation in calling it a wide
outside off and coming in. Defends on the back foot to cover
outside off and coming in. Defends on the back foot to extra cover
short and wide outside off, drives on the up to cover
pitching on the good length and carries a little more bounce than usual, which forces Tushar to grope in the dark as all he manges to get is an outside edge to the keeper, who accepts it gleefully
outside off and coming in, Shakib moves across and defends to point
outside off and swinging away, left alone to the keeper
Mason settling into the groove now as he is consistently pitching it in the corridor, not allowing batsmen any room
on the off stump, swinging away. Goes back and defends back to the bowler
short on the middle stump, Aftab ducks under the ball comfortably
rare offering from Mason. On the middle and coming in, Aftab flicks to midwicket easily and gets a couple
fulleron the off stump, driven back to the bowler
outside off and coming in, Shakib moves across and defends on the back foot
outside off and coming in. gets behind the line and defends
short outside off and swinging away. Shakib tries to cut and misses it by a mile
outside off and coming in, defended back to the bowler
outside off and swinging away, cut to third man for a couple
outside off and swinging away, short in length. Shakib stands tall and drives to mid off for a single
on the middle stump. Good length delivery. There is nothing that Shakib can do other than defending back to the bowler
outside off and coming in, defends on the back foot to backward point
outside off and coming in, short in length. Ducks under the ball
short on the leg stump, Shakib moves across and flicks to square leg
outside off and swinging away. Shakib gets behind the line of the delivery and drives to mid off
outside off and swinging away. On the good length. Left alone to the keeper
outside off and coming in. Aftab gets behind the line and defends the ball dead onto the pitch
short outside off. Aftab moves back and tries to cut and misses
on the leg stump, flicks to square leg for a single
outside off and swinging away, left alone
fuller in length outside off. Drives it on the up to cover
short outside off, Shakib moves across and cuts to point, a touch in the air - difficult to take- for a streaky boundary
Violence here. Outside off, fuller in length. Aftab goes for a full blooded inside out drive and succeeds
outside off and coming in, left alone to the keeper
short outside the off stump, Aftab stays at the crease and lets it go
on the good length outside off. Aftab steers it to third man for a single
on the middle stump, fuller in length. Drives back to the bolwer
on the middle stump, short in length. Shakib moves back and across and defends to cover
outside off and short in length. Aftab gives himself some room and tries to cut, but misses
short on the off stump, Aftab moves across and tries to paddle, but changes mind at the last moment and defends
on the off stump, fuller in length, lifts over long on for a boundary
fuller outside off, drives straight back to the bowler
short outside the off stump. lets it go to the keeper
outside off and swinging away, left alone to the keeper
short on the leg stump, lets it go to the keeper
on the middle stump, swinging away a touch, defended on the back foot to cover
on the leg stump, flicks to square leg for a single
outside off and swinging away, moves back and guides over point for a single
on the leg stump, swinging away. Shakib drives to mid off for a single
outside off, fuller in length. Aftab comes down the track and thumps it over mid off for a boundary
outside off and spinning. tries to cut and misses
outside off and defended back to the bowler
outside off and fuller in length, drives to deep cover for a single
on the middle stump, Aftab goes back and defends on the back foot
outside off, Aftab goes back and defends
outside off and Aftab steers to point off the back foot
short on the middle stump, driven of the back foot to cover. Tries to take a quick single but does not
outside off , driven of the back foot to cover
outside off and coming in, drives to cover of the back foot
outside off and coming in, short in length. Shakib tries to pull and withdraws at the last moment
short on the off stump,Shakib goes back and pulls, gets a top edge which does not quite carry
outside off and coming in, tries to drive and misses
outside off, steered to short third man

on the leg stump and turning away. Aftab sweeps it without getting behind the line of the delivery and gets a top edge to short fine leg, where Sinclair takes the catch. Vettori now is joint highest wicket taker for New Zealand in ODI's
outside off and Reza tries to defend and misses
on the middle stump, pushes to mid wicket for a single

outside off and a touch short in length. Shakib tries to cut and gets a bottom edge onto the stumps.Double strike in the over as Vettori, now has the highest number of wickets in ODI's for New Zealand
outside off, Rahim moves across and defends on the back foot
outside off and coming in, tries to drive and misses
outside off and coming in, Reza sees till the last moment and lets it go
outside off and coming in, ducks under the delivery
outside off and swinging away, driven in the air through mid off for a boundary
outside off and swinging away, tries to cut and misses
outside off and coming in, defends on the back foot
on the leg stump, Rahim moves across and misses the line and is cleaned up
outside off and tries to defend and misses
outside off and left alone
outside off and tries to defend and misses
outside off, plays and misses
outside off, finally gets a bat onto the ball as he defends on the front foot
on the leg stump, flicked to square leg
outside off and steered to short third man
short outside off, pulled to deep mid wicket for a boundary.
outside off and coming in, defended on the back foot to the bowler
outside the off, steers to third man for a single
on the middle stump, short in length. ducks under it
on the middle, Reza comes down the track and misses as it goes to first slip
outside off, tries to cut and gets a botton edge as McCullum drops it
pushed to mid wicket for a couple
outside off, Flighted delivery. Reza chances his luck once too often as he comes down the track and is beaten in flight. McCullum stumps him
on the off stump, defended on the front foot
on the off stump, defended to cover
outside off and coming in, defended on the back foot
outside off, Razzak goes onto the back foot and defends
on the middle stump, short in length. Ducks under the delivery
outside off and swinging away, defended on the back foot
short outside off, cut to third man, albeit off an edge for a boundary
on the middle stump, flicked to short fine leg
on the leg stump, defended back to the bowler
on the off stump, drives to mid off on the full
full outside off, drops it dead onto the pitch
on the legs, flicked to short fine leg
outside off, driven to cover
on the leg stump, turned to square leg off the hips
outside off and swinging away, left alone to the keeper
outside off, defends on the back foot. drops it onto the pitch
on the leg stump, turns to fine leg for a single
outside off and coming in, defended on the back foot
outside off and coming in, defended on the back foot to mid off
outside off and left alone to the keeper
short outside off, cut to deep backward point for a single
short outside off, tries to cut and misses
outside off and defended on the front foot
short outside off, drives to deep extra cover for a couple
arm ball on the off stump, Mortaza plays for spin and cuts as he is deceived by the line and is bowled
on the leg stump, pushed to mid wicket of the back foot
outside off and swinging away, driven to cover
outside off and short in length, pulled to mid wicket
on the middle and swinging away a touch, defended on the back foot
outside off and short in length, as Razzak tries to knock the cover off the ball and gets a thick outside edge to third man, where Chris Martin pouches the catch

inn2.comm: short outside off, How stands tall and defends to cover
outside off and coming in, defended on the back foot to the bowler
short outside off, pulled to deep mid wicket for a couple
short outside off again, How pulls again, but takes a single this time
short outside off, pulls it hard. off the top edge to fine leg for a boundary
outside off and swinging away, tries to defend and misses
outside off and swinging away, called a wide and rightly so
outside off and swinging away. tries to cut and gets a bottom edge and takes a single
brilliant. Just outside off, McCullum picks the length and square drives to point boundary
outside off and swinging away, McCullum swings and misses, called a wide
outside off and short in length, McCullum tries to upper cut it and misses again, goes for four byes
outside off and coming in, defended to cover on the front foot
outside off, fuller in length. Drives on the front foot to mid off for a boundary
short outside off, McCullum smashes over cover for a six
outside off, steered to third man for a single
on the leg stump, short in length, off the outside edge to third man for a boundary
WHAT A STRIKE........ comes down the track, goes down on one knee and pulls over deep mid wicket for a fabulous six. The ball's projectile takes it out of the ground
outside off, fuller in length, drives to mid on
on the off stump, drives to mid on
outside off, steered to deep back ward point for a couple
outside off and swinging away, wide outside the off stump, and run across for a single too as Rahim fumbles
full toss outside off, drives to mid off
fuller in length, outside off. Smashes past mid off for a boundary.
outside off and swinging away, cut over cover for another boundary
this is savage now. short outside off as McCullum upper cuts it for a six at third man
full toss outside off, drives to mid off for a boundary
on the leg stump, turns to mid on for a single
on the leg stump, turns to fine leg for  a couple to get to a electrifying half century off 19 balls
outside off, steps out and works to deep square leg for a single
turned to square leg for a single
on the off stump, pulled over mid wicket for a six. This has become routine now
on the off stump, drives to mid off
WHOA ! steps out and lifts over mid wicket for a six
on the leg stump, turned to square leg for a single
short outside off, drives to sweeper on the off side for a couple
fuller on the off stump, McCullum steps out and smashes to mid off for a boundary
flighted delivery outside off, launches it over sight screen for a six
outside off defended on the front foot
take that, steps out and smashes to long on for another boundary.Seals the win
